context.introduction: Explore the art of Korean marinades and grilled meats. Learn how time and ingredients create tender, flavorful dishes.

sections.title: Natural Tenderizers
sections.content: Korean marinades often include ingredients like Asian pear and soy sauce to tenderize meat.

sections.title: Marination Time
sections.content: Proper marination requires patience. The right timing develops flavor while ensuring tenderness.

sections.title: Meat Selection
sections.content: Different cuts of meat are used for different dishes, each bringing unique texture and flavor.

sections.title: Grilling Tips
listItems: Slice meat thin for quick cooking
Use a hot grill for caramelization
